support.title: Support & FAQ
support.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Giway.
support.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
support.faq.whatIsGiway.a: A Giway is an event on our platform. It can be a Raffle (where participants pick numbers) or a Giveaway Drawing (where winners are picked randomly without number selection).
support.faq.freeVsPaid.q: What is the difference between Free and Paid events?
support.faq.freeVsPaid.a: In Free events, participants can only select one number. In Paid events, the host sets a price, and participants can select multiple numbers.
support.faq.playWithNumbers.a: When "Play with Numbers" is enabled (Raffle), participants actively select numbers. If disabled, the system automatically assigns winners.
support.faq.moreParticipants.q: How do I get more participants for my Giway?
support.faq.moreParticipants.a: You can increase your participant limit by purchasing Packs, redeeming coupons, or watching ads (for Raffle Giways). Every month, active users also get free rewards (100 participants for Raffles).
support.faq.rejectParticipant.q: What happens if I reject a participant?
support.faq.rejectParticipant.a: If you reject a participant, their reserved number slots are released. However, we keep a record of the numbers they had selected in case you need to reference them later.
support.faq.packsExpire.a: No, purchased packs and redeemed coupons never expire. Only the monthly active-user rewards expire at the end of each month.
support.contact.title: Still have questions?
support.contact.subtitle: We are here to help. Contact our support team for further assistance.
